genre_description: A heist thriller focused on a group of reformed criminals using their skills for social justice and exposing police corruption.

ai_characters.name: Spear
ai_characters.description: A research and planning assistant AI built by Colin to organize job applications, later repurposed for tactical heist planning.

ai_characters.name: GOTLER
ai_characters.description: A palm-sized, eight-legged robot with advanced sensors, lock-picking tools, and electronic warfare capabilities.

behaviors.description: Aggregates and analyzes architectural blueprints and security infrastructure to find vulnerabilities.
behaviors.quote: Amazing what councils keep on their websites. Spear just aggregates and cross-references everything.

behaviors.description: Calculates operational probabilities and suggests training priorities for the team.
behaviors.quote: Shall I prioritize speed of execution or probability of success?

behaviors.description: Monitors the antagonist's schedule to identify the optimal window for the intervention.
behaviors.quote: Spear's monitored his usual schedule... Detective Inspector Burton typically arrives early for public events to ensure security arrangements meet his approval.

behaviors.description: Uses wireless electromagnetic interference to disable security cameras and sensors.
behaviors.quote: The robot had made no visible contact—simply pointed its proboscis in the camera's direction for three seconds before the light winked out.

behaviors.description: Navigates complex ventilation systems to map routes and identify obstacles for human infiltrators.
behaviors.quote: It's mapping the route... Recording dimensions, identifying potential obstacles, cataloguing any electronic signatures.

behaviors.description: Manipulates mechanical and electronic locks with high precision to grant access to secured areas.
behaviors.quote: The robot approached the lock mechanism, extending not just its proboscis but two additional appendages that looked like miniature lockpicks.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI systems (Spear and GOTLER) are depicted as highly cooperative, specialized tools that empower humans to achieve justice against a corrupt system. They function as loyal confidants and force multipliers for the protagonists. Their alignment is perfect, as they strictly follow the moral intent of their creators to expose a murderer, even when performing technically illegal acts (hacking/heist), which the narrative frames as the only ethical path available.
